contest-event.event-date: Nov. 1, 1952 D National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship The Frogs of Aristophanes Empress Hall, Earl's Court, County of London, England, UK Frank Wright was the appointed referee. Prizes: 1st: 200 Guineas 2nd: 150 Guineas 3rd: 75 Guineas 4th: 50 Guineas The contest started at 10.30am Oct. 14, 2011, 2:44 p.m. Oct. 14, 2011, 2:50 p.m. 1 Fairey Band Harry Mortimer 2 Fodens Band Harry Mortimer 3 Black Dyke Band Alex Mortimer 4 Creswell Colliery Band George Hespe 5 Morris Motors Band Harry Mortimer 6 Cory Band Walter B. Hargreaves 7 Clydebank Burgh Band W. Woods 8 Brighouse and Rastrick Band Eric Ball Unknown Result Carlton Main Frickley Colliery Band George Hespe Unknown Result Crookhall Colliery J. J.
